abstract: Stocks rise slightly near end of lackluster trading day.
lead_paragraph: A report on China’s economy sent the price of oil and other commodities lower. Weight Watchers doubled in value after Oprah Winfrey said she was taking a stake.

headline.main: Modest Gain for the Market, but Energy Stocks Decline
headline.print_headline: Last-Minute Gains in a Lackluster Market

snippet: A report on China’s economy sent the price of oil and other commodities lower. Weight Watchers doubled in value after Oprah Winfrey said she was taking a stake.
